html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-10712024-10-04PS
ActCustoms Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Customs Act (Low Value Shipment Threshold)
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE CUSTOMS ACT (LOW VALUE SHIPMENT THRESHOLD) in order to (1) amend the low-value shipment thresholds to reflect the new amount of $3,300 in the Accounting for Imported Goods and Payment of Duties Regulations, the Fees in Respect of Mail Regulations, and the Proof of Origin of Imported Goods Regulations; and (2) amend certain sections of the Proof of Origin of Imported Goods Regulations to replace the requirement to provide a written statement certifying the origin of commercial goods with a value for duty of $3,300 or less with a requirement to provide a commercial invoice indicating the origin of the goods.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0199 Publication Date: 2024-10-23
AttachmentsAttachment
precis:
Regulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE CUSTOMS ACT (LOW VALUE SHIPMENT THRESHOLD) in order to (1) amend
the low-value shipment thresholds to reflect the new amount of $3,300 in the Accounting for Imported Goods and Payment of Duties Regulations, the Fees in Respect of Mail Regulations, and the Proof of Origin of Imported Goods Regulations; and (2) amend certain sections of the Proof of Origin of Imported Goods Regulations to replace the requirement to provide a written statement certifying the origin of commercial goods with a value for duty of $3,300 or less with a requirement to provide a commercial invoice indicating the origin of the goods.
